</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a sensor ([[trigger]]) of the given type and at the given position. The type must be a class name in CfgNonAIVehicles or CfgVehicles with simulation <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> detector. An array containing all units that have activated the trigger is available via [[list]] ''triggerobj''. Created triggers can be deleted using [[deleteVehicle]].<br><br>

<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.43.129935 triggers can be created locally on clients setting optional param ''makeGlobal'' to [[false]]</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.53.132440 triggers can be disabled/enabled using [[enableSimulation]] command</value></part></template><br>

Triggers are created with default params, which are:
* <tt>a</tt>: 50.0
* <tt>b</tt>: 50.0
* <tt>c</tt>: -1
* <tt>angle</tt>: 0
* <tt>rectangular</tt>: false
* <tt>activationBy</tt>: None
* <tt>activationType</tt>: Present
* <tt>repeating</tt>: false
* <tt>timeoutMin</tt>: 0
* <tt>timeoutMid</tt>: 0
* <tt>timeoutMax</tt>: 0
* <tt>interruptable</tt>: true
* <tt>type</tt>: None
* <tt>text</tt>: ""
* <tt>name</tt>: ""
* <tt>expCond</tt>: "this"
* <tt>expActiv</tt>: ""
* <tt>expDesactiv</tt>: ""
* <tt>interval</tt>: 0.5 (Cannot be accessed via editor, [[setTriggerInterval | scripted only]] since Arma 3 v1.97.146056)
 
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''createTrigger''' [type, position, makeGlobal]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [type, position, makeGlobal]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - usually "EmptyDetector"</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> position: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]] or [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> makeGlobal (Optional): [[Boolean]] - locality flag  ''(available since Arma 3 v1.43.129935)''
* [[true]] (Default) - trigger is global <template><title>EffArg</title><part><name index="1"/><value>cmd</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>eff</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>glob</value></part></template>
* [[false]] - trigger is local <template><title>EffArg</title><part><name index="1"/><value>cmd</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>eff</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>local</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] - created trigger</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_trg = [[createTrigger]] ["EmptyDetector", [[getPos]] [[player]]];

_trg [[setTriggerStatements]] ["this", "hint 'Civilian near player'", "hint 'no civilian near'"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
